thread.title: Watch: Stunning timelapse of the North Island
thread.title_full: Watch: Stunning timelapse of the North Island

title: Watch: Stunning timelapse of the North Island
text:
Watch: Stunning timelapse of the North Island Last updated 13:19, August 19 2015 White Cloud TimeLapse 
From a supermoon to the sun rising over Auckland, this timelapse is stunning. 
Auckland-based Steven Harrison, from White Cloud TimeLapse , has created a stunning video showcasing the North Island. 
From a supermoon rising to the sun setting over Auckland, the video Hit the lights is a recent compilation of Harrison's timelapse videos since the beginning of 2014. 
"They are either the holy grail of timelapses (day to night, or vice versa) or taken at night. I love to make timelapses that have a change in light because it shows what a video or a photo is unable to, " Harrison said. WhiteCloud TimeLapse 
The impressive timelapse video showcases the best of the North Island. 
"This video was one of my entries to the New Zealand Geographic time-lapse competition. A big thank you to German Music producer Tim Gavois for allowing me to use his track Be with m e," he added. 
What do you think of the timelapse? Let us know in the comments.
